# Intro 


## Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read in Data
```{r, results='hide'}
sports <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2022/2022-03-29/sports.csv')

```

## Clean data

```{r}
glimpse(sports)
fems<- sports %>% 
  select(femsum = sum_partic_women,
         sports, state_cd, institution_name,
         femtotal = ef_female_count) %>% 
  group_by(institution_name) %>% 
  mutate(sumfem = sum(femsum, na.rm = TRUE))
```
